005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements <a href=
025 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-remove">fn:remove</a>.
026 */
027public final class FnRemove {
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name("remove")
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("target")
037          .type(IItem.class)
038          .zeroOrMore()
039          .build())
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("position")
042          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .returnType(IItem.class)
046      .returnZeroOrMore()
047      .functionHandler(FnRemove::execute)
048      .build();
049
050  private FnRemove() {
051    // disable construction
052  }
053
054  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
055  @NonNull
056  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
057      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
058      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
059      IItem focus) {
060    ISequence<?> target = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
061    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
062    return ISequence.ofCollection(fnRemove(target, position));
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Remove the specified item at {@code position} from the {@code sequence}.
067   *
068   * @param <T>
069   *          the type for the given Metapath sequence
070   * @param target
071   *          the sequence of Metapath items from which we will remove the item
072   * @param positionItem
073   *          the position of the item in the sequence to be removed
074   * @return {@code sequence} the new sequence with the item removed
075   */
076  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
077  @NonNull
078  public static <T extends IItem> List<T> fnRemove(
079      @NonNull List<T> target,
080      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem) {
081    int position = positionItem.asInteger().intValue();
082
083    if (position == 0) {
084      return target;
085    }
086
087    if (position > target.size()) {
088      return target;
089    }
090
091    List<T> newSequence = new ArrayList<>(target);
092    newSequence.remove(position - 1);
093    return newSequence;
094  }
095}
